entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness then snow beginning this evening and ending after midnight. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 30 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 4 May 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon. Wind south 30 km/h becoming light in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 4 May 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow and blowing snow beginning in the evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 60 gusting to 80 overnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 4 May 2023
